title: All random Ultra Rapid Fire (AR URF) I think its terrible
body:
After playing 5 games of this new innovation of Urf, i think its 100% terrible and shouldnt be reincarnated unless massive changes are made.
I understand the concept of urf and its craziness, but when it comes down to it the fun is lost when the entire enemy team rolls urf gods while your team rolls champs who cant even compare even with their heightened cooldowns and their other skills

If AR had a banning funtion in which teams banned champs before they were rolled out to them, i could see some enthusiasm to go back into it but when a game is rolled over by the following champs

"Full ap Magic pen"{{champion:28}} "Full aoe damage/tanky" {{champion:36}} "Your probably deaf now" {{champion:37}} and  "good luck running" {{champion:19}} I have yet to play in a game where a team can counter a comp like this where everyhting is spammed and all toggles are turned on.

Urf was fun in its previous renditions, but nowdays with all the champion updates and this idea behind it being all random, i would rather play the actual Aram then this nonsense ever again

replies.body:
Dont play it, then.
Same problems ARAM has; clearly nobody cares, especially riot.
The chance that you might have an unfair game but almost always have a good variety of champions is a lot better than the same stagnant game of two op teams with a pool of about 20 champions.
